game.name: Deviation Game
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A co-op party game where you draw things humans can understand, but an image recognition AI can't! 2-6 players can join with just one copy of the game, using your mobile browser as your controller.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A co-op party game where you draw things humans can understand, but an image recognition AI can't! 2-6 players can join with just one copy of the game, using your mobile browser as your controller.
